name.ja: <ruby>聖<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>霊<rt>れい</rt></ruby><ruby>獣<rt>じゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>騎<rt>き</rt></ruby> レイラウタリ

text.en:
3+ Effect Monsters
Neither player can Tribute cards to activate a card effect. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ritual Beast Ulti-Reirautari" once per turn. You can target 1 of your banished "Ritual Beast" cards; return it to the hand or Extra Deck, then, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Normal Summon 1 "Ritual Beast" monster from your hand. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Ritual Beast" card you control and 1 card your opponent controls; banish them.
